data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Elfsborg to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
In the minute 1, Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Varberg, Elfsborg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Varberg, Rasmus Alm of Elfsborg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Free kick Elfsborg.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
In the minute 8, Elfsborg attack but Joseph Okumu's header doesn't find the target.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Varbergs in Varberg.
Elfsborg needs to be cautious. Varbergs have an attacking throw-in.
Rasmus Alm of Elfsborg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Granit Maqedonci signals a Elfsborg throw-in in Varbergs's half.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In the minute 13, Elfsborg drives forward and Jeppe Okkels gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Paskbergsvallen, Elfsborg are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Elfsborg at Paskbergsvallen.
Ball safe as Elfsborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Varbergs.
In the minute 19, Varbergs push upfield but Granit Maqedonci quickly pulls them for offside.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elfsborg's half?
Throw-in Elfsborg.
In the minute 23, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Sivert Heltne Nilsen for Elfsborg has been booked by Granit Maqedonci and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 27, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Granit Maqedonci awards Elfsborg a goal kick.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 28, Frederik Holst (Elfsborg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Varbergs are pushing forward but Joakim Lindner's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Varberg.
In the minute 30, Granit Maqedonci awards the home team a throw-in.
Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Varbergs.
In the minute 32, Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Varbergs's half?
Throw-in for Elfsborg close to the penalty box.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Elfsborg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Rasmus Alm (Elfsborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Granit Maqedonci signals a throw-in for Elfsborg, close to Varbergs's area.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Elfsborg.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Elfsborg.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
Granit Maqedonci awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 45, Granit Maqedonci awards Varbergs a goal kick.
Granit Maqedonci blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Elfsborg in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Elfsborg in the half of Varbergs.
Granit Maqedonci awards Varbergs a goal kick.
In Varberg Varbergs drive forward through Adama Fofana. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 59, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Varbergs's Junes Barny misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Elfsborg at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 59, Varbergs awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Gojani is replacing Frederik Holst for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
In the minute 61, In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Robin Tranberg of Varbergs gets in a strike, but is off target.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
In the minute 69, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
The away team have replaced Jeppe Okkels with Jacob Ondrejka. This is the second substitution made today by Jimmy Thelin.
In the minute 72, Per Frick (Elfsborg) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Varbergs are coming forward and Erion Sadiku gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Elfsborg goal kick.
In the minute 73, Elfsborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Elfsborg at Paskbergsvallen.
Important block from the Varbergs defence as Per Frick fires in a strike for Elfsborg.
In the minute 74, Elfsborg's Simon Olsson is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg have been awarded a corner by Granit Maqedonci.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Elfsborg in the half of Varbergs.
Elfsborg have a goal kick.
Varbergs make their first substitution with Robin Book replacing Anton Liljenback.
In the minute 78, Joakim Persson is making the team's second substitution at Paskbergsvallen with Albert Ejupi replacing Erion Sadiku.
Free kick for Elfsborg in their own half.
Elfsborg's Per Frick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Varbergs defender.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Elfsborg.
Elfsborg's Simon Olsson breaks free at Paskbergsvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Granit Maqedonci awards Varbergs a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Joakim Persson (Varbergs) is making a third substitution, with Keanin Ayer replacing Robin Tranberg.
Elfsborg are pushing forward but Sivert Heltne Nilsen's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Can Elfsborg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Varbergs's half?
Elfsborg's Johan Larsson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Elfsborg have a dangerous throw-in.
Granit Maqedonci signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Varberg Elfsborg attack through Johan Larsson. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
Throw-in for Varbergs close to the penalty box.
Joakim Lindner gets his shot on target but fails to score for Varbergs.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Albin Winbo is replacing Gideon Mensah for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Isaac Prince Kouame is on a sub for Simon Olsson for Elfsborg.
